Thu Dec 28 03:13:43 PM UTC 2023
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/bin
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/gnu-which-2.21/bin/which /opt/bin/which
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share/info
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share/man
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share/man/man1
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/gnu-which-2.21/share/info/dir /opt/share/info/dir
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/gnu-which-2.21/share/info/which.info /opt/share/info/which.info
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/gnu-which-2.21/share/man/man1/which.1 /opt/share/man/man1/which.1
